affect ( "scientist05", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "walk" )
	{
		set ( "SET_TASK", "Path" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "nearscientist06" );
	}

	dowait ( "walk" );
	use ( "5and6" );
	set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_LOOK_TARGET", "scientist06" );

}
